meanings.definition: To waste time or dawdle aimlessly.
meanings.sent1: Stop faffing around and finish your homework.
meanings.sent2: She was faffing about instead of getting ready for school.
meanings.sent3: The cat was faffing with a ball of yarn, completely ignoring its toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: He kept faffing with the remote control, trying to find the right channel.
meanings.sent5: The children were faffing in the playground, enjoying the sunny day.

meanings.definition: To fuss or fiddle with something unnecessarily.
meanings.sent1: Please stop faffing with your hair and let's go.
meanings.sent2: She was faffing with the buttons on her new shirt.
meanings.sent3: He was faffing with the settings on his phone, making it beep constantly.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic was faffing with the engine, trying to figure out the issue.
meanings.sent5: The chef was faffing with the spices, trying to perfect the flavor of the dish.

meanings.definition: To engage in unproductive or trivial activities.
meanings.sent1: Instead of working, he spent the day faffing on social media.
meanings.sent2: She was faffing around the house, rearranging things for the tenth time.
meanings.sent3: The team was faffing during the meeting, discussing irrelevant topics.
meanings.sent4: He was faffing with his collection of stamps, organizing them by color.
meanings.sent5: The students were faffing in the library, chatting instead of studying.
